### Marine Ecology in a changing world

I am a marine ecologist at the **French Research Institute for Sustainable Development** ([**IRD**](https://www.ird.fr/)), working within the [**MARBEC**]((http://www.umr-marbec.fr/)) (MArine Biodiversity Exploitation and Conservation) laboratory. My research lies at the intersection of ecology and sustainability, with a focus on the biodiversity, resilience, and conservation of coastal ecosystems.
